Gail Porter broke down in tears on Loose Women immediately today, as she opened up about her recent bankruptcy. 
With tears running down her face, the former Celebrity Big Brother star confessed her money woes got so bad she was forced to sleep on a park bench in Hampstead Heath. 
And Stacey Solomon gave her pal a big hug to comfort her. 
Speaking about how it affected her having to hide it from her daughter, she said: “It was ages and ages ago.” Read More Gail Porter gets 28JJ breasts reduced to C-cup after confessing she 'cut herself' because they made her feel 'ugly' Gail Porter in tears as she opens up about living on a park bench in Hampstead (Photo: ITV) Gail Porter in tears as she opens up about living on a park bench in Hampstead (Photo: ITV) Gail Porter in tears as she opens up about living on a park bench in Hampstead (Photo: ITV) 
“Honey didn’t know. She does know now that she’s 14, she understands that I had a hard time, but you keep it to yourself.” 
But Gail confessed her problems worsened due to keeping her mounting debts a secret. 
She said: “You bottle things up and they get worse and worse, so then you don’t want to tell anyone. 
“But I have a wonderful relationship with my daughter, and I get on well with my ex-husband.” Gail Porter in tears as she opens up about living on a park bench in Hampstead (Photo: ITV) Gail Porter in tears as she opens up about living on a park bench in Hampstead (Photo: ITV) Gail Porter in tears as she opens up about living on a park bench in Hampstead (Photo: ITV) Gail Porter in tears as she opens up about living on a park bench in Hampstead (Photo: ITV) Gail Porter in tears as she opens up about living on a park bench in Hampstead (Photo: ITV) 
Gail - who was known for presenting hit shows like Fully Booked and Top of the Pops in the 1990s - was declared bankrupt last week , and had been living on £200 a month as she lives on a diet of just Marmite on toast so she can support her teenage daughter. 
"My money problems have just snowballed and I’ve had nowhere to turn," she previously told The Sun . Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
